comment: I almost never answer the phone anymore . Someone will come out with an app soon that just turns off all notifications of incoming calls . And whenever ubiquitous satellite internet comes out , Bell , Rogers , and Telus are done . <URL>
amr:

            :mod (a3 / almost)

      :snt2 (c / come-out-09
            :ARG1 (s / someone)
            :ARG3 (a4 / app
                  :ARG0-of (t / turn-off-07

                              :ARG1 (c2 / call-02
                                    :mod (ii2 / incoming))
                              :mod (a5 / all))
                        :mod (j / just))
                  :time (s2 / soon))
            :snt3 (a6 / and
                  :op2 (b / be-done-08
                        :ARG1 (a7 / and

                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Bell"))

comment: I ve had to stop answering my home line , too . It s almost always CPC hustling for a donation . -5 calls a day minimum from various cities across the country . Kingston one day , Ottawa the next , Summerside PEI next . It s brutal . And they ve never stopped calling my two mobiles .
